channel.title: People are so stupid in runescape it amazes me
channel.description:
I see this level 38 somethin wearin full addy (g) (of coure you know he would have a main) casting magic spells and i tell him that if u dont wear that armor you wont cast as many bad spells and you will get more xp and he said to me 'no it dont noob u idiot'
wow.... it amazes me how stupid people are on runescape

item.title: People are so stupid in runescape it amazes me
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

hes saying leave rs, and earth for a matter of fact,

just today i was playing on rs right, and someone (level 103) said, will someone plz make me funiture, so i said dude you ahve to make your funiture yourself inside your house, and he says “noob” and walking away

so i say to these kind of poeple UNINSTAL NOW (since whe you playing a downloadable game, mean you suck so mad you should never play) and sometime i wanna yell at people(who are sooo stupid)

UNINSTALL LIFE NOW!!!

oh well,

“there are to many stupid people, and not enough people to eat them” - carlos menicia, mind of menica

Read full topic
item.source: People are so stupid in runescape it amazes me

item.title: People are so stupid in runescape it amazes me
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

Its crumble undead people used to cast it like mad on the zombies in the mage guild but they would make their offensive magic liek -70 or so so they would never hit but crumble undead always gives same exp no matter what you hit.[br][size=1]Posted at: June 01, 2006, 09:56:26 am[/size][hr]Forgot to mention this was called the splash trick.

Read full topic
item.source: People are so stupid in runescape it amazes me

item.title: People are so stupid in runescape it amazes me
item.dc:creator: @ipl0x ipl0x
item.description:
@ipl0x wrote:

[quote=“doomsday, post:20, topic:3414”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=4048.msg40311#msg40311 date=1148935826]
Poopy, I would put on all my armour when I used to train magic. Regardless of what you hit, spells ALWAYS give the same XP. I’d try to get as many hits in as possible per monster, its better and quicker training. Unless this has changed…
[/quote]

ALL SPELLS GIVE YOU XP FOR WHAT YOU HIT FOR

see, people are noobies… ha ha ha its called www.tip.it look at magic guide, oh noes i was correct[/quote]

Amazing…?

Read full topic

item.description:
@ipl0x wrote:

[quote=“1337h4x, post:12, topic:3414”]LOL weak? Hahaha… you won’t think its so weak when youre friends meet me in wild and I barrage you.

So, you can’t move. You ALL get hit 30’s on. Again. Repeat. OWNED.[/quote]

K? I guess you didn’t read the “…cheap ways of fighting” part of that line.

item.title: People are so stupid in runescape it amazes me
item.dc:creator: @ipl0x ipl0x
item.description:
@ipl0x wrote:

[quote=“1337h4x, post:10, topic:3414”]No. You only get HP when you hit higher then 0 with a combat spell IDIOTS. Thats why pures wear armor when maging. TO NOT GET HP.

ipl0x – tell that to my Ice Barrage.[/quote]
K?
Ice Barrage, I think they are weak and cheap ways of fighting.

item.title: People are so stupid in runescape it amazes me
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:

item.source: People are so stupid in runescape it amazes me

item.title: People are so stupid in runescape it amazes me
item.dc:creator: @ipl0x ipl0x
item.description:
@ipl0x wrote:

[quote=“Galook, post:8, topic:3414”]No… The spell has a base xp + some damage multiplier xp…

those are damage spells…

non-damage spells ALWAYS give you the same xp, and since it is easier to target a monster over and over with curse instead of switching monsters each time, people try to fail-cast, unless he was training with damage and just didnt want xp[/quote]

But do you still gain HP from non-damage spells?
I am no mage, I think they are weak and cheap ways of fighting.

Read full topic
